Room.Name: Orange Jacinith Hall
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a magnificent hall made completely of orange jacinith. The way continues to the north and south. To the south, you can see the iron gate through which you originally entered. To the north, the hallway seems to go on forever. Strangely, you can see yourself in it.
Room.LongDescription: This hallway is very deceptive. You appear to be heading around in circles but can't really tell one way or another. As you continue to explore this very odd hallway, you notice that to the north and south are two giant crystals that reflect light, giving an appearance of an endless corridor.
